00025 #ifndef _BASE_EXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_EXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/ExpressionNode>
00030 
00031 #include <mtl/mtl.h>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace base {
00035 
00036 
00037 //
00038 // An expression that can be evaluated with a parameter Vector
00039 //  and differentiated. Has value semantics.
00040 //  (represented as an ExpressionNode tree)
00041 
00042 class Expression : public Object
00043 {
00044 public:
00045   Expression();
00046   Expression(Real constant);
00047   Expression(const Expression& e);
00048 
00049   virtual String className() const { return String("Expression"); }
00050 
00051   Real       evaluate(const Vector& params) const;
00052   Expression differentiate() const;
00053 
00054   String toString() const;
00055 
00056   struct VariableIndexer { Expression operator[](Int i) const; };
00057 
00058   static VariableIndexer p; 
00059 
00060   Expression& operator=(const Expression& e) { expr = e.expr; return *this; }
00061   Expression& operator+=(const Expression& e);
00062   Expression& operator-=(const Expression& e);
00063   Expression& operator*=(const Expression& e);
00064   Expression& operator/=(const Expression& e);
00065   Expression& negate();
00066   Expression& sin();
00067   Expression& cos();
00068 
00069   friend class VariableIndexer;
00070 
00071 protected:
00072   Expression(ref<ExpressionNode> expr)
00073     : expr(expr) {}
00074 
00075   ref<ExpressionNode> expr; // root of ExpressionNode tree
00076 };
00077 
00078 
00079 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Expression& e) // Output
00080 { return (out << e.toString()); }
00081 
00082 
00083 
00084 // function operators/operations
00085 inline Expression operator+(const Expression& lhs, const Expression& rhs)
00086 { Expression r(lhs); r+= rhs; return r; }
00087 
00088 inline Expression operator-(const Expression& lhs, const Expression& rhs)
00089 { Expression r(lhs); r-= rhs; return r; }
00090 
00091 inline Expression operator*(const Expression& lhs, const Expression& rhs)
00092 { Expression r(lhs); r*= rhs; return r; }
00093 
00094 inline Expression operator/(const Expression& lhs, const Expression& rhs)
00095 { Expression r(lhs); r/= rhs; return r; }
00096 
00097 inline Expression negate(const Expression& e)
00098 { Expression r(e); r.negate(); return r; }
00099 
00100 inline Expression sin(const Expression& angle)
00101 { Expression r(angle); r.sin(); return r; }
00102 
00103 inline Expression cos(const Expression& angle)
00104 { Expression r(angle); r.cos(); return r; }
00105 
00106 
00107 //... etc.
00108 
00109 
00110 
00111 // A Matrix|Vector of Expressions
00112 typedef mtl::matrix<Expression, mtl::rectangle<>, mtl::dense<>, mtl::row_major>::type ExpressionMatrix;
00113 typedef mtl::dense1D<Expression> ExpressionVector;
00114 
00115 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const ExpressionMatrix& m) // Output
00116 { 
00117   for(Int r=0; r<m.nrows(); r++) {
00118     for(Int c=0; c<m.ncols(); c++) {
00119       out << m(r,c) << " ";
00120     }
00121     out << "\n";
00122   }
00123   return out;
00124 }
00125 
00126 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const ExpressionVector& v) // Output
00127 { 
00128   out << "[";
00129   for(Int i=0; i<v.size(); i++)
00130     out << v[i] << ((i!=v.size()-1)?",":"]");
00131   return out;
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 
00136 } // base

00138 #endif
